summary: The module implements a training and evaluation pipeline for a Probabilistic Graph Neural Network using DGL and PyTorch. It loads a dataset, prepares graph structures, constructs the PGNN model, runs iterative optimization, computes loss values, and assesses model performance with metrics such as ROC AUC.
business_intent: Enable users to train and benchmark a graph neural network model on custom graph data, facilitating research or production workflows that require node or link classification with probabilistic reasoning.
